<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1347&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/bdf70a943e752449d658e884bc35af61608590944.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Exclusive Garage Sale




Enjoy up to 90% off on L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian, and Sol de Janeiro!

Available exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members on 25th June and 26th June at the L'Occitane D3 Office.

Cash payment only. T&Cs apply.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/b88cb55ead9327f4b4a502c2524f8e93631108883.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Women in Tech Programme Launch 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1348&user=10620> 	

Last month, Tech&Data launched the Chalhoub Group Women in Tech Upskilling Programme in partnership with Salesforce, empowering women to lead the digital future. From 2% to 26% female representation in Tech, we’re making significant strides.

The programme focused on AI, Data, Cloud, and more, with participants earning 509,775 Trailhead points and 1,615 badges over 4 weeks.

Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1348&user=10620>  to read more and check out the top 3 Trailblazers

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

THE DEAL X Mulberry | Exclusive Sale




Exclusive sale of up to 70% for Chalhoub Group team members from today till 26th of June! Online only
